snippet.title: [Official] Unboxing Dracula's Tomb Edition [Castlevania: Lords of Shadow 2]
snippet.description:
KONAMI's European Communities Manager, Su-Yina Farmer, gives an exclusive first look at the Castlevania: Lords of Shadow 2 "Dracula's Tomb Edition".

Castlevania: Lords of Shadow 2 will be coming on PlayStation®3, Xbox 360® and Windows PC on February 27th, 2014.

Developed by Mercury Steam.

Buy now:

UK:
GAME 
PlayStation 3 - http://bit.ly/1daE4FF
Xbox 360 - http://bit.ly/1loewyH

France:
Micromania
PlayStation 3 -- http://bit.ly/1loeFlT
Xbox 360 - http://bit.ly/1bar3vP

Germany:
Gamestop
PlayStation 3 - http://bit.ly/1n1olyb
Xbox 360 - http://bit.ly/1eA9SVb

Spain:
GAME
PlayStation 3- http://bit.ly/NhIdSC
Xbox 360 - http://bit.ly/1fWsrGH

For more information follow us at: 
http://www.konami-castlevania.com
http://facebook.com/lordsofshadow
http://twitter.com/CastlevaniaLOS
